title: Divya Emerald and Diamond Hasli Haaram - A Touch of Hyderabad's Elegance
materials: Natural Emeralds (Marakathamani) with vivid green hue and excellent clarity
South Sea Pearls. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for enduring shine.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a delicate floral motif crafted with brilliant cut diamonds. The necklace is anchored by a larger central pendant with a focal emerald, and a larger floral motif with diamonds, and a lower pendant featuring an oval emerald surrounded by diamonds with cascading South Sea pearls. The gold chain is a modern mesh style. The intricate setting showcases the sparkle of each individual diamond, while the emeralds bring a touch of regal grace. This blending of modern and traditional motifs offers a unique interpretation of the classic Hasli.
occasions: and upscale social events. Makes a stunning statement for modern brides and for those seeking to add a touch of traditional opulence to their contemporary wardrobe.
description: This stunning haaram represents the epitome of Hyderabadi craftsmanship and design. The use of high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds enhances its value and beauty. Its exquisite craftsmanship ensures a timeless piece that can be cherished for generations. The modern design makes it versatile for any occasion.
